meanings.definition: The formation of a blood clot within a blood vessel.
meanings.sent1: A thromboses can block the flow of blood in a vein.
meanings.sent2: Doctors study thromboses to understand how they affect the body.
meanings.sent3: The tiny thromboses in the model blood vessel looked like little bumps.
meanings.sent4: The clot was a stubborn thromboses, refusing to dissolve easily.
meanings.sent5: The danger of thromboses is that they can travel to the lungs and cause serious problems.
